title: Grab the Soundcore Life Q20 Headphones for $50 with this Deal!
description: Soundcore's affordable headphones are a lot cheaper right now. The post Grab the Soundcore Life Q20 Headphones for $50 with this Deal! appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Mike Viray
excerpt: Soundcore's affordable headphones are a lot cheaper right now.
text: Good-sounding audio doesn’t need to be expensive – this is true with Anker’s Soundcore brand of products, which features a great lineup of devices to look into, all with wallet-friendly prices across the board. With that in mind, the Soundcore Life Q20 headphones are currently on sale right now, and they do pack a decent amount of features. In terms of hardware, the Soundcore Life Q20 headphones come with hybrid active noise cancelling (ANC) functionality, hi-res audio and deep bass, as well as up to 40 hours of playtime on a single charge. They’re also pretty comfortable, making them ideal for prolonged music sessions or lengthy zoom meetings. You can check them out using the link below. html:
Good-sounding audio doesn’t need to be expensive – this is true with Anker’s Soundcore brand of products, which features a great lineup of devices to look into, all with wallet-friendly prices across the board. With that in mind, the Soundcore Life Q20 headphones are currently on sale right now, and they do pack a decent amount of features.

In terms of hardware, the Soundcore Life Q20 headphones come with hybrid active noise cancelling (ANC) functionality, hi-res audio and deep bass, as well as up to 40 hours of playtime on a single charge. They’re also pretty comfortable, making them ideal for prolonged music sessions or lengthy zoom meetings. You can check them out using the link below.
